Lyric:
[by:immaculatewhore]
[00:07.30]I woke up with a fear this morning
[00:10.35]But I can taste you on the tip of my tongue
[00:15.41]Alone without no warning
[00:18.49]You're by my side and we go smoking at lunch
[00:21.64]
[00:23.60]Last night we were way up, kissing in the back of the cab
[00:27.68]And then you say "love baby let's go back to my flat"
[00:31.72]And when we wake up, never had a feeling like that
[00:35.78]I got a reason so man, put that record on again
[00:39.49]
[00:39.72]I don't want to hear sad songs anymore
[00:42.79]I only want to hear love songs
[00:44.90]I found my heart up in this place tonight
[00:47.93]Don't want to sing mad songs anymore
[00:51.10]Only want to sing your song
[00:53.60]Cause your song's got me feeling like that
[00:55.73]
[00:56.60]I'm in love, I'm in love, I'm in love
[01:00.13]Yeah, you know your song's got me feeling like that
[01:03.79]
[01:04.25]No fear but I think I'm falling
[01:06.14]I'm not proud
[01:07.25]But I'm usually the type of girl that would hit and run
[01:12.37]No risk so I think I'm falling
[01:15.00]When I kiss your lips, through my heartbeat thumb
[01:18.46]
[01:20.47]And now we're way up, dancing on the roof of the house
[01:24.58]And then we make love, right there on your best friend's couch
[01:28.58]And then you say "love, this is what is all about"
[01:32.70]So keep on kissing my mouth and put that record on again
[01:36.50]
[01:36.66]I don't want to hear sad songs anymore
[01:39.70]I only want to hear love songs
[01:41.82]I found my heart up in this place tonight
[01:44.90]Don't want to sing mad songs anymore
[01:47.91]Only want to sing your song
[01:49.96]Cause your song's got me feeling like that
[01:52.68]
[01:53.30]I'm in love, I'm in love, I'm in love
[01:57.13]I'm in love, I'm in love, I'm in love
[02:01.17]I'm in love, I'm in love, I'm in love
[02:05.21]Yeah, you know your song's got me feeling like that
[02:09.10]
[02:09.22]I don't want to hear sad songs anymore
[02:12.30]I only want to hear love songs
[02:14.40]I found my heart up in this place tonight
[02:17.41]I don't want to sing mad songs anymore
[02:20.45]I only want to sing your songs
[02:22.52]Cause your song's got me feeling like that
[02:25.45]

[02:28.51]I only want to hear love songs
[02:30.63]I found my heart up in this place tonight
[02:33.61]Don't want to sing mad songs anymore
[02:36.66]Only want to sing your song
[02:38.81]Cause your song's got me feeling like that
[02:41.44]
[02:41.84]I'm in love, I'm in love, I'm in love
[02:45.89]I'm in love, I'm in love, I'm in love
[02:49.97]I'm in love, I'm in love, I'm in love
[02:54.20]Yeah, you know your song's got me feeling like that
